string.value: I heard Grako's best friend #bMariwaka#k, who resides in Showa Town, is going through some hard times. I better go there and check it out myself.
I met up with Mariwaka. Yeah, it looks like something's troubling her...

Well, actually... I have something else to ask from you... can you help me out once more? Go meet up with Mariwaka, who should be near the movie theater. She told me something a while ago, and... I was too busy to pay attention to her, and I feel really bad about it. She's my best friend, you know... can you help me?
Sweet. Thank you. The movie theater is in Showa Town.
You must be busy. Oh well, nothing I can do about it. If you got some time to spare, please come help me out here~
...are you here on behalf of Grako...?
Grako... haha. Last time I saw her, she was acting all busy and stuff, you know... at least she remembers that I told her SOMETHING~
I heard that #bMarikawa#k is in need of urgent help!! Perhaps you can help her out if you are not too busy~ Please go see her!
